title: RT News - October 17, 2019 (12:00 MSK)
text: Running battles in Barcelona for a third night, as tens of thousands of protesters vent their anger over the jailing of nine Catalan independence leaders. A UK court mulls a ban on protests at a Birmingham school where parents are outraged by LGBT lessons. We hear from the governor of another school, who say she was accused of being homophobic after objecting to LGBT themes in education. RT releases more exclusive video from a former US military base in Syria, abandoned by Washington shortly before Turkey's offensive against the Kurds started.
description: Running battles in Barcelona for a third night, as tens of thousands of protesters vent their anger over the jailing of nine Catalan independence leaders
